title: 4 stars
text: The game is fun, but I was playing the game and a ad just popped up. But otherwise great game!

title: If you love ads, this is the game for you
text: The title says it all. This is a fun game that literally is designed to force you to pay to stop the ads. We all expect ads in between levels of free games. Breaking in with ads mid level, sometimes even more than once mid level, is a new one though. It’s so interruptive of game play that you either quit or pay for the no ads purchase. Okay, no big deal, you say. BUT there’s also no way to link the game via Facebook or anything else. So it’s trying to force me to pay a second time to stop ads on my iPad even though I already paid on my iPhone for the app. This is just beyond absurd even in the land of ads that apps have become.

title: Push them all
text:
Except after this update! What where u thinking? $$$$$$.  You will lose too many players. Pop up while playing and come back and guy runs right off edge. Bingo 2 ads. Everyone remembers Mario Bro’s. We never would have made it anywhere if it had ads like all these apps. I 
At some point people will just get too frustrated and stop buying the ones with ads.  
I HAVE ALREADY DELETED 75% of games with ads. SICK OF THE ABUSE.  THE Companies with very few ads and in the correct places well actually make sales in the future. The money grubbing ads that are out now will be gone. 
Good luck.

title: To many ads!!
text: I used to love this game and I never leave reviews but there are way to many ads, I understand that the game needs to make money, but they throw in an ad in the middle of the game while you’re playing and at the end of it. If you were playing for 10 minutes, you’d probably only get 3 minutes of gameplay and the rest is just ads, they need to fix this now or nobody will ever play this game.

title: Way too many commercials

title: So many ads
text: I like this game but will be uninstalling it. I’m fine with ads. It used to be every level.  But now I get ads after every single zone. So it’s 5 seconds of play then a 15-20 second ad. I’m not doing it anymore. I get it’s about money, but when you can’t even play the game because of the ads that’s a bit much.

title: WAY to many adds.

Game could be a blast but the adds are so aggressive that they just cut you off in the middle of a stage. I know it’s free but the adds will kill this game alone.

title: To many ads

title: Fun game until you added more ads..
text: I could handle the ads between levels. But now as I cross the bridge into the next zone I have to watch an ad. Uninstall...

title: Too many ads
text: There will be an ad between levels, then after each zone I clear in a level. It’s a free game so I expect ads so if it was just every once in a while I’d be okay but it feels like I spend more time looking at advertisements than I do actually playing. The actual game is fun if you’re bored though if you’re patient enough to sit through each 30 second add

title: Ads
text: To many ads.

title: Could have been fun
text: So When I downloaded this it was a fun game. After playing it for a couple of days they started interrupting my game with ads!  I understand the concept of free games and having to watch ads but to put them in the middle of your game is ridiculous!!  It actually messes up your game play. Part of gameplay is to build up your roller to allow for further reach but when you come back from their ad your roller does not respond and neither do the controls for your person. Let’s be clear, there are plenty of ads that pay for the “free” game but they just got greedy to put them in the middle of your game!!!!!  I have really liked several of the games that this developer has made but if this is the direction they are taking for all of their games I will avoid all of them.

title: Keep pushing!
text: At first I was confused about how to be able to “Force Push” and then I just got it! Out of the blue and I have been enjoying it so much; just remember that you Can fall off the surface and then you can get back to where you were after you either “pay” to come back or you watch an ad. Super fun game though!

title: Too many adds
text: There are too many adds but I love the game itself.

title: Ultimately, it needs improvement and less greed
text:
I don’t have a lot of expectations for this series of games using the same physics and behavior engines...they are not challenging at all, but they have a certain ASMR-satisfying quality about them. The problems are two-fold: it gets repetitive really fast, and now they have doubled the ads now to include one in the middle of rounds, which really throws off one of the fun game mechanics. 

I am not really as invested in this game as this review may make it seem, but there is potential here. How about a much harder game and only one 30 second ad for every thirty seconds of gameplay? And if it was harder, I’d definitely buy it.

title: Ad after ad after ad
